items.sentence: Are you sure you want to give all this stuff away?
Not many people can afford to buy a car like that.
I got to know Tom while I was living in Australia.
Tom probably isn't going to go to Boston tomorrow.
Tom probably isn't still interested in doing that.
Tom is probably not going to be at home on Monday.
Tom is probably not going to be impressed by that.
Tom is probably not going to volunteer to do that.
Tom was out of breath after running up the stairs.
You should get to the hospital as soon as you can.
I think you should stay home from school tomorrow.
Tom probably isn't the best student in this class.
Tom probably isn't the tallest person in the room.
Tom probably isn't going to be here all afternoon.
Why didn't you just do what you'd been told to do?
I thought that you used to teach French in Boston.
I'm still not certain what time I should be there.
On my way to the theater I saw a traffic accident.
The last time I saw Tom was last summer in Boston.
There's one thing I need to do before I can leave.
Tom's body was found in the shed behind his house.
There was candle wax on the table near the candle.
Why don't we try doing this the way Tom suggested?
This is the most interesting novel I've ever read.
If you ever do that again, Tom will be very angry.
Tom spent all afternoon playing with his children.
I believe that Tom said that he'd be here by 2:30.
We should be in Boston by 2:30 tomorrow afternoon.
Tom had never dreamed that he could feel so happy.
Do you think that it'll be easy for me to do that?
There are lots of other things we should be doing.
I've already done most of what I have to do today.
Tom and I were suspended from school for fighting.
Tom usually weeds his garden early in the morning.
Tom can make friends easily no matter where he is.
When Tom saw Mary and John together, he was angry.
Tom wasn't able to get the cork out of the bottle.
Tom used the screwdriver to clean his fingernails.
Tom turned around to see if he was being followed.
Tom told me his father had been killed in the war.
Mary had never kissed a boy before she kissed Tom.
More than 20,000 Americans are murdered each year.
In the end, I found out what was wrong with my TV.
That game is easy, once you learn the basic rules.
The school is within walking distance of my house.
We demanded that he explain to us why he was late.
We finally decided to give him over to the police.
It takes you an hour to go to the station on foot.
All we have to do now is wait for Tom to get here.
I didn't begin to study French until I was thirty.
